name: David Ramirez
text: Yeah, I guess they could just read in a massive amount of expression data. That would be interesting if they can eventually make a system that can read in all of a dead actor's scenes over his career and reconstruct his face and expressions perfectly. Well, wouldn't need to be an actor--could be anybody if there's enough film of them, so public figures.
